title: get current template
name: get_current_template
sql:
select t.id, t.name, m.url as preview_url, mt.url as template_url, t.description from {{PREFIX}}items t
inner join {{PREFIX}}altrp_media m on t.preview_id=m.id
inner join {{PREFIX}}altrp_media mt on t.template_id=mt.id
where t.id = {{REQUEST:id}}

title: get preview templates
name: get_preview_templates
sql:
select t.item_type, t.id, t.name, m.url as preview_url from {{PREFIX}}items t
left join {{PREFIX}}altrp_media m on t.preview_id=m.id
where "template" = t.item_type

title: get items from current cart
name: get_items_from_current_cart
sql:
select s.site_domain as domain, i.*, m.url as preview_url, c.* from {{PREFIX}}cart_items c
left join {{PREFIX}}cart_item_sites s on c.id=s.cart_item_id
left join {{PREFIX}}items i on c.item_id=i.id
left join {{PREFIX}}altrp_media m on i.preview_id=m.id
where c.cart_id = {{REQUEST:cart_id}}
GROUP BY c.id

title: insert order items
name: insert_order_items
sql:
insert into {{PREFIX}}order_item_models (order_id, item_type, item_id, parent_id)
select {{REQUEST:order}}, c.item_type, c.item_id, c.id from {{PREFIX}}cart_items c where c.cart_id={{REQUEST:cart_id}}

title: insert order items site
name: insert_order_items_site
sql:
insert into {{PREFIX}}order_item_sites (order_item_id, site_domain)
select m.id, s.site_domain from {{PREFIX}}cart_items c
left join {{PREFIX}}cart_item_sites s on c.id=s.cart_item_id
left join {{PREFIX}}order_item_models m on m.parent_id=c.id
where c.cart_id={{REQUEST:cart_id}}

title: update order
name: update_order

title: get bought templates
name: get_bought_templates
sql:
select i.*, d.url as preview_url, mt.url as template_url from {{PREFIX}}order_item_models o
inner join {{PREFIX}}orders m on o.order_id=m.id
inner join {{PREFIX}}users u on m.user_id=u.id
inner join {{PREFIX}}items i on o.item_id=i.id
inner join {{PREFIX}}altrp_media d on i.preview_id=d.id
inner join {{PREFIX}}altrp_media mt on i.template_id=mt.id
where {{REQUEST:user}}=u.id and o.payment_date is not null and i.item_type="template"

title: get preview sets
name: get_preview_sets
sql:
select t.item_type, t.id, t.name, m.url as preview_url from {{PREFIX}}items t
left join {{PREFIX}}altrp_media m on t.preview_id=m.id
where "set" = t.item_type

title: get current set
name: get_current_set
sql:
select t.id, t.name, m.url as preview_url, mt.url as template_url, t.description from {{PREFIX}}items t
inner join {{PREFIX}}altrp_media m on t.preview_id=m.id
inner join {{PREFIX}}altrp_media mt on t.template_id=mt.id
where t.id = {{REQUEST:id}}
